svg.text: End-to-End Flow: From Question Analysis to Image Generation
‚úì Fairness rules (Consistent style for all options)
IF image_required = TRUE ‚Üí Generate detailed prompts (100-150 words each)
Includes: Subject, Context, Style, Composition, Colors (hex), Background, Lighting, Details, Quality
Ensures: All options same style, No vague terms, Age-appropriate complexity
IF image_required = FALSE ‚Üí All prompts = null
"A bright pink (#FF69B4) spiral-bound planner with white
pages, designed for teaching grade 3 students about time
management. Flat illustration style with bold black outlines.
Planner shown from 30-degree top-down angle, centered in
frame, occupying 65% of image. Yellow pencil (#FFD700)
diagonally across. White background. Soft diffused lighting.
‚úÖ All 4 options have images - Fair assessment
Question Image + Option A, B, C, D Images
Ready for educational use in exams
‚Ä¢ Model-agnostic prompts (works with any AI image generator)
